column1: # Loading Tips should be here. Do not add anything that is not a loading tip

column2: The Earth King has a unique resource known as Royal Authority, which can be spent on special Casus Belli, laws and diplomatic actions.
Children of Air Nomads are born to the dynasty of their same-sex parent, sons belonging to their father's dynasty and daughters to the mother's.
All children of Air Nomads are legitimate heirs.
The Earth King's Tributaries make him a powerful opponent.
The Avatar is a powerful authority, and if angered, an even greater opponent.
Build a Shrine to the Spirits to receive a blessing and their favour.
Fire Feudalism makes it easier to convert tribes and build Factories.
Characters and provinces convert via events and decisions in the Four Nations.
The arrival of Sozin's Comet will bring a new era.
The Western Earth Kingdom is especially at risk of Fire Nation attack.
